### Overview

The paper presents a novel, adaptive optimization algorithm for large-scale machine learning that is able to achieve the same or better performance as existing state-of-the-art algorithms with much faster speedup. The proposed method can be used in many applications such as training neural networks and solving linear inverse problems. The authors also provide an open-source implementation of the algorithm.

### Key Contributions

The main contributions of this paper are threefold. First, the authors present a novel adaptive optimization algorithm that is able to achieve the same or better performance as existing state-of-the-art algorithms with much faster speedup. Second, the authors show how to use the proposed method in many applications such as training neural networks and solving linear inverse problems. Third, the authors provide an open-source implementation of the algorithm.
